name: Steal Power
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Mythic Adventures © 2013, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: You sap the power from a mythic creature, using it to restore your own. the target loses 1d4 uses of mythic power. If you have the ability to expend mythic power, you regain one use for each use the target loses.
text_zh: 你能够让其他神话生物的精气衰竭，从而恢复自身的力量。目标失去1d4次神话之力。若你具有花费神话之力的能力，那么目标每失去1次神话之力，你便能恢复1次。
